document.title: SumNL-samenvattingencorpus Commercieel
document.intro: The SumNL Corpus of Summaries (Commercial) is based on 28 clusters. Each cluster consists of a subject and 5-25 newspaper articles who are relevant to that subject. Two summaries (of different size) were made for each cluster and also extracts which consist of ten sentences from the tex... Summaries

access.title: available for commercial organisations;  user licence required
